952 I am becoming more and more convinced that the vast majority of America’s problems could be solved by deporting illegal aliens. 
 What am I missing here? posted 2 days ago by CyanScales 67 comments award share report block Matt Van Swol @mattvanswol • 3d I am becoming more and more convinced that the vast majority of America’s problems could be solved by deporting illegal aliens. - Housing - Healthcare - Wages - Inflation - Traffic - Huge amounts of crime What am I missing here?
67 comments Sort by Top Top New Worst Old Save USMC6541E5 23 points 2 days ago What a mind blowing concept!!! permalink award report block reply KilroyJCNJ 11 points 2 days ago Van Swol is a convert. Hurricane Helene opened his eyes. permalink parent award report block reply Granny 8 points 2 days ago Missing? There are so many entities that are making big profits off the illegals, and that's why it's like pulling teeth to get rid of them. Another Pede just pointed out how much $$ Pepsi is making from SNAP recipients. The whole food industry, along with housing, health care, etc are making windfall profits at the taxpayers' expense, due to our financing the presence of the illegal hordes. Then the lobbyists in DC will not allow this great cash flow to be removed!!! permalink parent award report block reply Transparency 1 points 2 days ago Another Pede just pointed out how much $$ Pepsi is making from SNAP recipients. Got a link? permalink parent award report block reply DeportThemAllForever -2 points 2 days ago This, every builder out here (red state btw) uses illegals.  I submit info to ice, so far nothing.  All you got to do is show up during construction. Then we have a fiber optic company “tdscable”, all illegals there laying cable, not a word of English. Disgusting how they managed to replace Americans with illegals everywhere, exploded social safety nets, and take no responsibility for these societal costs. permalink parent award report block reply farangbak 3 points 2 days ago Common sense is not so common.............. permalink parent award report block reply free-will-of-choice 15 points 2 days ago What am I missing here? That aliens pretending to be natives are running the migration scheme to generate problems to sell even more problematic solutions. permalink award report block reply Leporidae 4 points 2 days ago Riddle me this, it hits close to home.

We could manage to significantly cut  police funding due to the near zero percent crime rate, we could easily afford a SNAP/EBT program because we wouldn’t have lifers, gun violence would be zero, insurance would be cheaper, college costs may even drop. Liberals and their worship of diversity stops them from achieving their own goals. permalink parent award report block reply FutureFreemason 6 points 2 days ago National socialism permalink parent award report block reply Nibba2 12 points 2 days ago And the Muslims. permalink parent award report block reply pococurante 3 points 2 days ago It would solve problems, but it's wrong. They have been here for hundreds of years too, it's our problem to solve domestically. And what country would agree to that anyway? permalink parent award report block reply MrFrogBottom 12 points 2 days ago Ending H1-B and other stupid foreign worker programs. Bringing people that have no intention to accept your culture is just wrong even if their country of origin is bad.  It just isn't our problem to solve.  We are not the world's trash can for the violent criminals from other countries.  This is a simple replacement plan.  DEPORT and everything gets cheaper and we can get back to being great. permalink award report block reply TDBabyBite 5 points 2 days ago You're just missing the people pulling those strings facing consequences. permalink award report block reply PatriotSkorzeny 5 points 2 days ago LE doesn’t want to deport them.
